article_text:
Florida Gov. Rick Scott sued the federal government late last month for threatening to withhold more than $1 billion in Medicaid funds due the state under a waiver program first approved in 2005. And in Texas the Obama administration is threatening to cancel a five-year, $29-billion Medicaid waiver approved in 2011.

What’s going on? The Obama administration says that expanding Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act would be a better...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, John Daniel Davidson writes that the administration threatens health funding to states that declined to expand the program.
twitter.title: Obama’s Medicaid Extortion Gambit
